name: Touhou 11: Subterranean Animism

files.installer: N/A:Select the zip file of the game

content:
files:
- installer: N/A:Select the zip file of the game
game:
  exe: drive_c/Touhou11/th11\ (thpatch-en).exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Touhou\ 11\ - Subterranian Animism
    file: installer
- rename:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Touhou11
    src: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Touhou\ 11\ - Subterranian Animism
wine:
  version: staging-3.10-x86_64
